cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0896

description: ** DISPUTED **  SQL injection vulnerability in VCS Virtual Program Management Intranet (VPMi) Enterprise 3.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the UpdateID0 parameter to Service_Requests.asp.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.  NOTE: the vendor has disputed this issue, saying that "[we] have a behind the scenes complex state management system that uses a combination of keys placed in JavaScript and Session State (server side) that protects against the type of SQL injection you describe.  We have tested for many of the cases and have not found it to be an issue."  Further investigation suggests that the original researcher might have triggered errors using invalid field values, which is not proof of SQL injection; however, the vendor did not receive a response from the original researcher.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0897

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0909

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in post.php in ShoutLIVE 1.1.0 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via certain variables when posting new messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0941

description: SQL injection vulnerability in profil.php in PwsPHP 1.2.3, and possibly earlier versions, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the aff_news_form parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2005-1509.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0942

description: SQL injection vulnerability in the sondages module in index.php in PwsPHP 1.2.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter to index.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0943

description: Archangel Weblog 0.90.02 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication by setting the ba_admin cookie to 1.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0944

description: PHP remote file include vulnerability in admin/index.php in Archangel Weblog 0.90.02 allows remote authenticated administrators to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL ending in a NULL (%00) in the index parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0945

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Thomson SpeedTouch modems running firmware 5.3.2.6.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the name parameter to the LocalNetwork page.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0946

description: Thomson SpeedTouch modem running firmware 5.3.2.6.0 allows remote attackers to create users that cannot be deleted via scripting code in the "31" parameter in a NewUser function, which is not filtered by the modem when creating the account, but cannot be deleted by the administrator, possibly due to cleansing that occurs in the administrator interface.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0947

description: chpst in runit 1.3.3-1 for Debian GNU/Linux, when compiled on little endian i386 machines against dietlibc, does not properly handle when multiple groups are specified in the -u option, which causes chpst to assign permissions for the root group due to inconsistent bit sizes for the gid_t type.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1319

description: util.c in rssh 2.3.0 in Debian GNU/Linux does not use braces to make a block, which causes a check for CVS to always succeed and allows rsync and rdist to bypass intended access restrictions in rssh.conf.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1320

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in webcheck before 1.9.6 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) url, (2) title, or (3) author name in a crawled page, which is not properly sanitized in the tooltips of a report.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1321

description: Novell Netware NWFTPD 5.06.05 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (ABEND) via an MDTM command that uses a long path for the target file, possibly due to a buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1322

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in WinHKI 1.6 and earlier allows user-assisted attackers to overwrite arbitrary files via a (1) RAR, (2) TAR, (3) ZIP, or (4) TAR.GZ archive with a file whose file name contains ".." sequences.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1323

description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3, XP SP3, and other versions and packages, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a routing slip that is longer than specified by the provided length field, as exploited by malware such as TROJ_MDROPPER.BH and Trojan.PPDropper.E in attacks against PowerPoint.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0009

description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Adobe Flash Player 8.0.22.0 and earlier allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SWF file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0024

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Excel 2000, 2002, and 2003, in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3 and other packages, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a BIFF parsing format file containing malformed BOOLERR records that lead to memory corruption, probably involving invalid pointers.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0028

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Excel 2000, 2002, and 2003, in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3 and other packages, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via an Excel file with a malformed description, which leads to memory corruption.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0029

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft Excel 2000, 2002, and 2003, in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3 and other packages, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via an Excel file with a malformed graphic, which leads to memory corruption.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0030

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Microsoft Excel 2000, 2002, and 2003, in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3 and other packages, allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via an Excel file with a malformed record with a modified length value, which leads to memory corruption.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0031

description: Integer overflow in the do_replace function in netfilter for Linux before 2.6.16-rc3, when using "virtualization solutions" such as OpenVZ, allows local users with CAP_NET_ADMIN rights to cause a buffer overflow in the copy_from_user function.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0038
